supplied elements: Several elements of DMP rendered projected onto geometry
01_omens_eden.description: Overall grading of several DMP elements to suit direction, heavy tweaking of background dmp elements and adding details.             Layers of Rain Stock camera pulls backwards through and a Comp flock of doves.

supplied elements: Plate of dog walking with bluescreen background
Plate of moving forest background at HellHound Height
Prep/Paint of Plate Dog Head Removal & Jowl/Lip cleanup over dogs neck
Lighting Render of HellHound head & FX Saliva
02_omens_hellhound.description: Composited all elements. Added the CG Head to the Dogs body and matching musculature movement on the neck using animated STMaps based off trackers + vertices on the Geo.         Grading the CG to match the original dog plate, with some artistic license. Distorted the dogs body to suggest different size and to match better into moving background plate.             I was the sole compositor on all (7) of the Hell Hound head replacement shots.

supplied elements: Lighting Renders of Pokemon Characters (10 Pokemon) seperated into passes + Fences (deep)
03_pokemon_crowd.description: Composited all elements. Several layers of (10)Pokemon characters.

supplied elements: Lighting Renders of Pokemon Characters (Pikachu, Gengar, Blastoise) + Fences (deep)
04_pokemon_pikachu.description: Composited all elements. several layers of Pokemon characters and dealing with Plate elements (FG, Characters and Light beams or edges changing due to light behind them) that behave differently now there is a character             between the light source and them. This includes Animated Grades etc to sit the characters into the environment which has constantly changing light

supplied elements: Lighting Renders of Pokemon Characters (Charizard) seperated into passes + Fences (deep)
05_pokemon_charizard.description: Composited all elements. Similar to previous shot in terms of animated grades to help character integration, but this time the edges being babysit through light changes are fine detail hair and clothing.             For example, there is a light source behind the focus character which has been removed. Loads of edge work.

supplied elements: Lighting Renders of Pokemon Characters (Charizard, Pikachu, Growlithe) seperated into passes (deep)
06_pokemon_growlithe.description: Composited all elements. Similar to previous shot in terms of animated grades to help character integration, but this time the edges being babysit through light changes are fine detail hair and clothing.             For example, there is a light source behind the focus character which has been removed. Loads of edge work.

supplied elements: Motion Graphic Elements for bonks and slaps
FX for rain drips on characters & splashes on ground
07_tomjerry_keyboard.description: Composited all elements. Comp Lightning flash and careful attention to reflection in puddles and the wet look caused by rainfall.

supplied elements: Motion Graphic Elements for bonks and slaps
08_tomjerry_champagne.description: Composited all elements. Slight conundrum as a cartoon character is inside a real (stylistically) but cg object, so motion blur tweaked to help its integration. Loads of toonline artefacting fixes.

supplied elements: Lighting Renders of exterior wall & Window
Motion Graphic Elements for bonks and slaps
09_tomjerry_window.description: Composited all elements. Load of shadow and reflection tweaking with the set and window distortion/reflections.

supplied elements: Plate Foreground of character and some FG on Bluescreen.
Lighting Environment render of ocean & small rocks.
DMP of Sky and FG Rocks.

11_gijoe_satellite.description: Composited all elements. Assembling and Grading Lighting passes of the satellites + tweak grades using cryptomattes. Integration of Earth and Comp driven atmosphere into starfield, which required some tweaking to reduce twinkling of             pixel sized stars

supplied elements: 4 Plates of Soldiers in different positions of the shield wall
12_hercules_crowd.description: Composited all elements. Several plates of soldiers used to crowd-dupe into a single shield formation, which is then comped into a CG environment.             A fair bit of culling problematic/intersecting crowd cg warriors and seating in the smoke plumes.

supplied elements: Lighting Renders for CG Characters & Crowd
13_hercules_crowd_cg.description: Composited all elements. A fully CG shot to match into the sequence and previous shot

supplied elements: Lighting Renders for crowds and vehicles
14_kingsmen_westminster.description: Composited all elements. CG Crowd + Vehicles into a prepped plate. Careful management of shadows and edges in detailed areas and a little bit of tracking fixing here and there

15_hisdarkmaterials_airship.shot_name: Lee and Hester on the airship
15_hisdarkmaterials_airship.description: Composited all elements. Plate keying and integration of CG Character
